name: Sticky Notes with Auto-layout
description:
Sticky notes I used to explain my design when I deliver it to engineers. Rather than just me using it so I share it with this community, in case someone out there needs it. Don't hesitate if you want to leave feedback, Thank you


Ps.

I actually created it without realizing that Ben Radcliffe also make something like this. You can also try sticky notes from him in here
